methods.name: dsociety
methods.description: DID based on Ed25519 with SHA256 hash as Base58.

methods.name: selfdriven:sdi
methods.description: The selfdriven SDI assigned to each community member. It uses the common UUID format. e.g. ddea7071-c37b-4c3f-ab69-603870f5c9f6.

methods.name: selfdriven:sdip
methods.description: The SHA256 hashed selfdriven SDI assigned to each community member.

methods.name: selfdriven:cardano
methods.description: Uses the Cardano key/hash/addressing based on BIP32-Ed25519.
